about_the_game:
Three months after Sisters Possession 1.

Rick becomes a hero and begins an adventure to find MCF.
The grim plot of the Grimoire group is hidden there.

《Points of this work》

■Possession system

The main character and his male companions have the ability to possess a girl and can fight by possessing the body of a girl.
The number of friends is over 160! Combine the power of your mind and your body to defeat powerful enemies.

■Three soldiers system

This work is a tactical simulation RPG. In particular, the roles of infantry, cavalry, and artillery on the battlefield are clearly defined, and you can use them effectively to advance the game to your advantage.

Gamepad play recommended

content_descriptors.notes:
There are textual expressions of looting, violence, and slaughter by hostile forces.
There is a textual expression of sexual violence by hostile forces.
There is a sentence expression that feels like drinking alcohol for an adult.
There are textual expressions of masturbation and sexual harassment.
There is a nude depiction when taking a bath.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution

short_description: Sisters Possession is an SRPG. By possessing girls, you can gain an advantage in battle. Gamepad play recommended
